meanings.definition: A unit of electric current equal to one thousandth of an ampere.
meanings.sent1: The device uses milliamps to measure the flow of electricity.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check the milliamps on the meter to avoid overloading the circuit.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally connected the wires backward and now the milliamps are all over the place!
meanings.sent4: The milliamps flowing through the circuit were as gentle as a whisper.
meanings.sent5: The bright sparks danced along with the milliamps, creating a mesmerizing display.

meanings.sent1: The technician carefully adjusted the equipment to measure the milliamps accurately.
meanings.sent2: The milliamps in the circuit were too low to power the device.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I would be so fascinated by the concept of milliamps!
meanings.sent4: The milliamps surged through the wires like a river in full flow.
meanings.sent5: The sudden increase in milliamps caused the lights to flicker and dim.
